nodes.text: Luminator scanner goggles were a type of scanner goggles made by the Tagge Company which provided users with the ability to see in the dark. The goggles were available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and cost 150.
The Luminator scanner goggles was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
